title: Day 02: Cube Conundrum — day02
text: Part One \'re launched high atmosphere! apex trajectory just barely reaches surface large island floating sky. gently land fluffy pile leaves. \'s quite cold, don\'t see much snow. Elf runs greet . Elf explains \'ve arrived Snow Island apologizes lack snow. \'ll happy explain situation, \'s bit walk, time. don\'t get many visitors ; [like play game]title=", Elf's name 'WOPR'. Joshua." meantime? walk, Elf shows small bag cubes either red, green, blue. time play game, hide secret number cubes color bag, goal figure information number cubes. get information, bag loaded cubes, Elf reach bag, grab handful random cubes, show , put back bag. \'ll times per game. play several games record information game (puzzle input). game listed ID number (like 11 Game 11: ...) followed semicolon-separated list subsets cubes revealed bag (like 3 red, 5 green, 4 blue). example, record games might look like :   game 1, three sets cubes revealed bag (put back ). first set 3 blue cubes 4 red cubes; second set 1 red cube, 2 green cubes, 6 blue cubes; third set 2 green cubes. Elf first like know games possible bag contained 12 red cubes, 13 green cubes, 14 blue cubes? example , games 1, 2, 5 possible bag loaded configuration. However, game 3 impossible one point Elf showed 20 red cubes ; similarly, game 4 also impossible Elf showed 15 blue cubes . add IDs games possible, get 8. Determine games possible bag loaded 12 red cubes, 13 green cubes, 14 blue cubes. sum IDs games? Part Two (Use manually add .) (Try using convert_clipboard_html_to_roxygen_md())

title: Day 03: Gear Ratios — day03
text: Part One Elf eventually reach gondola lifttarget="_blank" station; says gondola lift take water source, far can bring . go inside. doesn\'t take long find gondolas, seems problem: \'re moving. \"Aaah!\" turn around see slightly-greasy Elf wrench look surprise. \"Sorry, wasn\'t expecting anyone! gondola lift isn\'t working right now; \'ll still can fix .\" offer help. engineer explains engine part seems missing engine, nobody can figure one. can add part numbers engine schematic, easy work part missing. engine schematic (puzzle input) consists visual representation engine. lots numbers symbols don\'t really understand, apparently number adjacent symbol, even diagonally, \"part number\" included sum. (Periods (.) count symbol.) example engine schematic:   schematic, two numbers part numbers adjacent symbol: 114 (top right) 58 (middle right). Every number adjacent symbol part number; sum 4361. course, actual engine schematic much larger. sum part numbers engine schematic? Part Two (Use manually add .) (Try using convert_clipboard_html_to_roxygen_md()) Part Two engineer finds missing part installs engine! engine springs life, jump closest gondola, finally ready ascend water source. don\'t seem going fast, though. Maybe something still wrong? Fortunately, gondola phone labeled \"help\", pick engineer answers. can explain situation, suggests look window. stands engineer, holding phone one hand waving . \'re going slowly haven\'t even left station. exit gondola. missing part wasn\'t issue - one gears engine wrong. gear * symbol adjacent exactly two part numbers. gear ratio result multiplying two numbers together. time, need find gear ratio every gear add engineer can figure gear needs replaced. Consider engine schematic :   schematic, two gears. first top left; part numbers 467 35, gear ratio 16345. second gear lower right; gear ratio 451490. (* adjacent 617 gear adjacent one part number.) Adding gear ratios produces 467835. sum gear ratios engine schematic?

code: demo <- parse_game("Game 1: 3 blue, 4 red; 1 red, 2 green, 6 blue; 2 green") limits_df <- data.frame(   colour = c("red", "green", "blue"),   max_count = c(12, 13, 14) ) validate_hands(demo, limits_df) #> [1] TRUE TRUE TRUE
